text: is a Japanese actress, voice actress and narrator. She was born in Tokyo. She is best known for her roles in the Pokémon series (as Pikachu). She also starred in One Piece (as Tony Tony Chopper), Naruto (as Konohamaru Sarutobi), Detective Conan (as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya), Uchi no Sanshimai (as Fu), and Konjiki no Gash Bell (as Gash).http://www.vip-times.co.jp/?talent_id=W94-0101 ==References== ==Other websites== * Official agency profile * Ikue Ōtani at Ryu's Seiyuu Info * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese voice actors Category:Actors from Tokyo
title: Ikue Ōtani
